title: Ore wo Suki Nano wa Omae Dake ka yo - Novel Updates
genre: Comedy   Drama   Ecchi   Harem   Romance   School Life   Shounen   Slice of Life
tags: Adapted to Anime   Adapted to Manga   Betrayal   Childhood Friends   Cunning Protagonist   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Male Protagonist   Modern Day   Perverted Protagonist   Stalkers   Tsundere
author: Rakuda   駱駝
description: What would you do, if a girl you're interested would confess to you? On top of it, it wouldn't be just one girl. A cool upperclassman adored by the whole school. And your cheerful, energetic childhood friend. I bet you would be over the moon. Thing is, what if there was an unexpected problem about the contents of that confession?>
